name: 'We Killed Yamamoto' Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: From what movie did Josh tell Donna that Amy was dancing a scene?
questions.explanation:
Flashdance.

	It was Sunday, Amy was listening to Van Morrison and dancing around. Josh was telling Donna what was going on and Donna said for him not to be frightened.

questions.text: On what subject did Sam meet with Jane and Muriel?
questions.explanation:
Everglades.

	They wanted Sam to go to Bruno about saving the Everglades with money taken from the end of sugar subsidies, but Sam told them he wouldn't do it and later he changed his mind.

questions.text: How long had it been since Mrs. Landingham passed away?
questions.explanation:
1 year.

	Charlie and the President went to visit her grave at Arlington.

questions.text: Josh sent Donna to which state to read a memo?
questions.explanation:
North Dakota.

	North Dakota wanted to take the word "North" out of their name and Josh sent Donna to Bismark so she could read a statement on why they shouldn't take "North" out of their name.

questions.text: What was Simon's answer when CJ asked him if his gym was a good gym?
options: "Work out with me and find out."
questions.explanation:
"We run alongside moving cars."

	CJ's gym was flooded and the White House gym closed at seven so Simon offered his gym so she could work out.

President Bartlet.

	Leo and the President were talking about marriage incentives and the President said a dental practice used to be all that was needed. He then said that the reason why he got married was because he was erudite, meaning he was smart.

questions.text: What item belonging to Josh did Amy throw in the stew?
questions.explanation:
Cell phone.

	Amy and Josh were having an argument about marriage incentives and Amy threw his cell phone in the stew to keep him from making a phone call and then cut the phone cord on her phone so he couldn't call out on it.

questions.text: For whom did Leo say he wanted to look good?
questions.explanation:
Fitzwallace.

	Admiral Fitzwallace and Leo were in the situation room talking about wartime versus peacetime when Fitz made the comment about Leo's shampoo and Leo replied that he liked to look good for him.

questions.text: On the first election Toby ever worked on, what happened to his candidate during a press conference?
questions.explanation:
He fainted.

	The first election Toby worked on was for Bronx Borough President and Toby turned off the air conditioning causing the candidate to faint during his speech.

No.

	Simon was walking CJ home and they came close to kissing, but realized that it wasn't a good idea.
